content.text: Match ends, Chelsea 4, Watford 2.
Second Half ends, Chelsea 4, Watford 2.
Goal!  Chelsea 4, Watford 2. Michy Batshuayi (Chelsea) right footed shot from the centre of the box to the centre of the goal. Assisted by Tiemoué Bakayoko with a headed pass.
Antonio Rüdiger (Chelsea) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Christian Kabasele (Watford).
Kiko Femenía (Watford) wins a free kick in the defensive half.
Foul by Eden Hazard (Chelsea).

Substitution, Watford. Andre Gray replaces Adrian Mariappa.
Corner,  Chelsea. Conceded by Christian Kabasele.

Substitution, Chelsea. Davide Zappacosta replaces Pedro.
Foul by Tom Cleverley (Watford).
